candidate.summary: Day Job: Progressive Web and Mobile App developer with 12 years of experience of building for the internet. Possesses a strong coding foundation in object oriented programming and highly knowledgeable of data structures and algorithms. Adaptive to different web technologies and concepts (Current Passions: MVC, Docker, Angular, Typescript & GoLang) to deliver an innovative website. Motivated by the process of creation and delivering a final project that exceeds expectations. Alter Ego: Technology and programming instructor with a passion of making tech literacy a realization within under represented communities.

accomplishments.detail: Curated tech education courses and curriculum using various technologies.
Leverage partnerships with schools, community organization and other non-profit organizations to established and expand tech educations within existing programs.
Implemented software to automatize operations and increase workflow efficiency.
Responsible building web assets, workspace folders and development environments for the online and in person class sessions.
Collected and analyzed data to generate reports that: assisted with grant writing; program adjustments and potential expansion opportunities.

experiences.description: Managed a team of 2 - 5 employees. Responsibilities included hiring, acquiring new business, developer training, team-building, coaching, project management. Launched over 15 web site redesigns from inception to completion.
experiences.title: Lead Developer

accomplishments.detail: Managed budgets, contracts, staff and project timelines based on the needs and requirements of the clients.
Monitored network activity to ensure essential information is collected to be tracked, logged and analyzed.
Utilized A/B testing to help increase web traffic flow, and convert that traffic into lead and eventually customers.
Created custom WordPress Themes and Plugins when necessary to support the specific needs of the client.
Designed website templates for projects[ sketches, wireframes, prototypes, PSDs].
Created and maintained the standards, document, files, media and oversaw production of Javascript, HTML, and CSS, PHP.
Developed tech curriculum for programs with assessments, to facilitate class lessons and measure success.
Instructed sessions that helped built foundational understanding of the basic programming principles.
Setup promotional campaigns to generate more enrollments with the school and programs offered.
Hosted presentations and workshop to enact interest in technology with children and teens.
Setup WordPress installation instances for new acquire accounts.
Developed themes and plugins for custom designed sites.
Created project timelines for backend coding functions.
Coding of custom Wordpress theme and template files.
Deployment from local environment to staging then to production using Git and a private repo on BitBucket.
Engaged students with activities that introduced technology principles that encourage critical and creative thinking.
Created projects to familiarize students with the method process it takes to complete most technology assignments.

experiences.description: Field inbound calls from customers helping to answer their questions, explain options and sell additional coverage"s as well as assisting them with adding and making changes to insurance policies.
experiences.title: Insurance Agent

accomplishments.detail: Trained & Developed new hires on sales techniques and tactics to enhance efficiency and production.
Facilitated presentations that analyzed team goals and changes to processe.
Implemented small programs to automate processes to increase workflow efficiency.
Brought in, maintained & saved over $1,000,000 in premium in 2012 and currently on pace to exceed that goal in 2013.
